Q: What does it taste like?
A: Mildly mineral, similar to high-quality spring water. Most people drink it straight in water. Some add it to juice or their morning smoothie. Either works great.
Q: How long until I feel something?
A: Most customers notice changes in energy and mental clarity within 3-7 days. Full benefits typically develop over 2-4 weeks of consistent daily use.
Q: Can I take this with my other supplements?
A: Yes. Marine plasma complements most supplement stacks. However, if you're taking prescription medications, we recommend checking with your doctor first.
Q: Where do you source the marine plasma?
A: Protected Atlantic waters, harvested at 30 meters depth where mineral concentrations are optimal. Every batch is third-party tested for purity‚Äîno heavy metals, no microplastics.

Q: Is this just expensive seawater?

A: No. Regular seawater is 35g/L salt. Marine plasma is harvested from a specific ocean depth where mineral ratios naturally match human blood plasma, then carefully filtered and concentrated. Very different product, very different results.
Q: Is it safe during pregnancy?
A: Marine plasma is generally considered safe, but we always recommend consulting your healthcare provider before starting any new supplement during pregnancy or nursing.
